title: runtime: openbsd is spinning
body:
I keep finding finding openbsd builders (I think just 386?) spinning.

Mostly recently I found it spinning at 57f4b430 but it's been happening for a few weeks.

In particular, I think it's usually caused by one of the tests in the "test" directory. Shard 4/5 seems to trigger it:

```
$ go tool dist test --no-rebuild test:4_5
```
